result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: from Atty Firkus updating the court of the def's address. mw

ADDRESS INFO for Nicholas Thomas Ryan
Current: 6171 Carmen Ave E, Inver Grove Heights, MN 55076 United States  (Effective: 11-02-2022)
Prior: 833 N State Road 46, Balsam Lake, WI 54810

AMENDED
$500 on file

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Melissa Smith, minors: J.R, L.R and W.R., except for by telephone contact by voice or text with minors and incidental contact with Melissa Smith to facilitate phone contact with minors.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

- Defendant is required to remain outside of 1.5 mile radius from: Resonetics - 2251 Willis Miller Dr., Hudson, WI; Best Western Plus New Richmond Inn and Suites, 240 Paperjack Dr., New Richmond, WI; 811 Orange St., Unit 2, Hudson, WI; 122 W Cascade Ave., River Falls, WI with exception of traveling to St. Croix County courthouse to attend court hearings. 

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

AMENDED
$500 on file

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Melissa Smith, minors: J.R, L.R and W.R. The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

-  I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required to be fitted with a GPS monitoring device with restriction of 1.5 mile radius from: Resonetics - 2251 Willis Miller Dr., Hudson, WI; Best Western Plus New Richmond Inn and Suites, 240 Paperjack Dr., New Richmond, WI; 811 Orange St., Unit 2, Hudson, WI; 122 W Cascade Ave., River Falls, WI with exception of traveling to St. Croix County courthouse to attend court hearings. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must IMMEDIATELY report to the Justice Support Center located adjacent to the lower parking lot of the St. Croix County Government Center. 

If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.
